titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the due payment of the subsidy and aulnage upon all woollen clothes and draperies.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the twenty ninth day of September, in the Twelfth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
